exercises.headline: Exercises
exercises.content: This tab lists all exercises of the selected course.

exerciseRow.headline: Current week
exerciseRow.content: The exercises of the current week will be displayed on top of the exercise list.

exerciseType.headline: Exercise type
exerciseType.content: The exercise type can be distinguished by the exercise icon.

exerciseTags.headline: Exercise tags
exerciseTags.content: The listed tags will give further information on the exercise classification, e.g. by difficulty

courseInformation.headline: Course information
courseInformation.content: This box displays general course information, such as the amount of exercises and the start and end time of the course.

upcomingDeadlines.headline: Upcoming deadlines
upcomingDeadlines.content: See what exercises have to be completed in the next few days.

lectures.headline: Lectures
lectures.content: You can find and download the all lecture slides from this tab.

statistics.headline: Statistics
statistics.content: This tab shows your current exercise accomplishments statistics.

startExercise.headline: Start with your first programming exercise
startExercise.content: Click on the 'Start exercise' button to start working on the exercise. This action takes a few seconds, since a personal repository is setup for you in the background.

sourceTreeTutorial.headline: SourceTree Tutorial
sourceTreeTutorial.content: While you are waiting for the repository setup, you can watch a video tutorial on cloning projects with SourceTree, if you are not familiar with SourceTree.
